name: CitySwift
tag_list: website, web, design, development, saas, software-as-a-service, cms, content-mangement-system, ecommerce, e-commerce
overview:
CitySwift is a digital agency that specialise in web design, web development and online marketing.

Core services include:

  • Web design
  • Web development
  • Content management systems
  • Ecommerce
  • Web based applications
  • Conversion of software to software as a service
  • Search engine optimisation
  • Search engine marketing
  • Email marketing

CitySwift WMS and CitySwift CRM are flagship products developed by CitySwift that are used by over 100 organisations in the UK. A CRM SAAS application is being developed by CitySwift for launch Q3 2009.

CitySwiftâ€™s client base is split 50:50 with other agencies who outsource web development and direct clients. Direct clients in include Kent County Council, Children England and the East Sussex Disability Association.
